title: NA - Delay in RP purchases - RESOLVED
body:
***Edit July 2nd*** *Everyone who purchased RP, but did not receive points, should now have had their RP properly credited!*

------------------------------------------------

Hey guys,

We've heard many of you complain about RP delays or the RP not showing up on your account at all.  Thanks to your posts here we were able to track a hiccup in the system that caused a group of North American players that have not receive their points yet.  

For now, we have been able to manually award the RP for credit card purchases, but other payment methods are taking a little longer to credit properly.  Rest assured we have 'Top Men' working on getting the rest of the RP purchases completed!
